name: PVC Adhesive Tape - Extra Strong (03.PVC5001) 50mm x 66m (W x L)
description: For high sealing requirements this quality PVC adhesive tape with a strong rubber (caoutchouc) adhesive is the best choice. The strong rubber adhesive ensures a permanent and secure seal that holds reliably even on long transports or under adverse conditions. Its excellent tack allows heavy cartons and packages to be securely sealed without the tape coming loose. Another advantage is its excellent tear and elongation resistance, making it resilient against mechanical stresses and ideal for demanding environments such as warehouses, shipping, or moving. Features: secure sealing on cardboard, paper, plastic, metal; high tear and stretch resistance longitudinally and transversely; for heavy packages; rolls off easily and quietly; approx. 53 µm total thickness.
